results-collection-and-display.name: Excel (XLS)
results-collection-and-display.description: Python scripts to format Veracode XML results into Excel workbook formats for easier human consumption.

results-collection-and-display.name: (XLSX)
results-collection-and-display.description: Python scripts to format Veracode XML results into Excel workbook formats for easier human consumption.

results-collection-and-display.name: Generate License Notice file
results-collection-and-display.description: Python script that creates a License Notice file (sometimes called an Attribution Report) for an application that has been scanned by Veracode SCA.

results-collection-and-display.name: Hygieia
results-collection-and-display.description: Veracode scan collector and parser for the [Hygieia dashboard](https://github.com/Hygieia/ExecDashboard).

results-collection-and-display.name: JupiterOne Graph Veracode
results-collection-and-display.description: A graph conversion tool for Veracode.

results-collection-and-display.name: SCA Extractor
results-collection-and-display.description: Creates a CSV file with open source vulnerability (SCA) findings for all builds in the input file.

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode Container Scan results to HTML
results-collection-and-display.description: Converts the JSON output of a Veracode container scan into HTML.

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode Scan Compare
results-collection-and-display.description: Use this tool to compare two Veracode Static Analysis (SAST) scans to understand why they are different.

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode Scan Health
results-collection-and-display.description: Produces a SAST scan health report with guidance on changes to make in order to improve the packaging and module selection to achieve greater flaw accuracy.

results-collection-and-display.name: VeraData
results-collection-and-display.description: Console application that will retrieve data (all scans, flaws, mitigations etc) for a given AppId and store the results in a relational schema (only supports MSSQL Server currently) ready for plugging your favourite BI tool into!

results-collection-and-display.name: VeraCustomTriage
results-collection-and-display.description: App that generates a .xlsx remediation plan from a set of scan results augmented with text from JSON configuration files. Custom text is added when flaw criteria is met (such as a CWE ID, module name, file or line number). This allows custom text such as internal workflows, wiki links, training, code snippets, 2nd party information or other languages into the auto generated remediation plan. Enables app sec teams to triage large volumes of flaws quickly whilst sharing a core advice repository in code.

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode Report Converter (CSV)
results-collection-and-display.description: .NET Framework utility to extract useful data from Detailed Report XML file into CSV format

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode Report Converter Portable (CSV)
results-collection-and-display.description: .NET Core utility to extract useful data from Detailed Report XML file into CSV format

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode Bulk Reporting API Import
results-collection-and-display.description: Retrieves all the data available from the Veracode Reporting API from a specific start date

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode Gitlab SCA results report and issue generation
results-collection-and-display.description: Rewrites Veracode's Agent Based SCA json results in Gitlab readable report format in (orde)r to display results as dependency scanning on the pipeline run

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode Gitlab static results report and issue generation
results-collection-and-display.description: A little Java Script will download json results from a Veracode policy or sandbox scan into Gitlab readable report format in order display results as SAST results on the pipeline run and create Gitlab issues on the findings

results-collection-and-display.name: VCCLI
results-collection-and-display.description: Veracode AST and Security Labs utility in .NET Core.

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode Container Security Display (Unofficial)
results-collection-and-display.description: Display, sort and filter Container Security JSON results.

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode Verify Scan Results
results-collection-and-display.description: This script checks for the results of the latest scan for an application profile (and optionally a sandbox) and returns all the results that meet a minimum severity criteria. Can optionally consider SCA results and fail a build.

results-collection-and-display.name: TopDesk
results-collection-and-display.description: Integration with ITSM | CSC | ESM tool called [TopDesk](https://www.topdesk.com/).

results-collection-and-display.name: Veracode-Agent-SCA-Project-PDF
results-collection-and-display.description: Generates a PDF report for a Veracode Agent-Based SCA project.
